profile.title: Senior Android Engineer | Tech Lead | Kotlin & Compose Specialist | CSM | CSPO
profile.professionalSummary: Results-driven Senior Android Engineer with 10+ years architecting and leading enterprise-scale mobile applications for 100M+ active user bases. Specialized in Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, and Clean Architecture with proven expertise in team leadership, code modernization, and technical strategy. Passionate about building scalable, maintainable systems and mentoring high-performing engineering teams.
keyStrengths: Enterprise-scale Android architecture (MVVM, Clean Code, modular design)
Kotlin/Compose expert with modern reactive patterns (Flow, Coroutines)
Technical leadership and team mentoring (CSM, CSPO certified)
AI Development Tools: Claude (Code), GitHub Copilot, Cursor, Antigravity

experience.title: Senior Android Engineer
experience.impact: Led architectural modernization of embedded fitness OS powering Technogym's AI-driven strength machines (Biostrength/Biocircuit) serving premium fitness facilities globally.
keyAchievements: Consolidated multiple legacy apps into a single mono-app (mono repo) with progressive Jetpack Compose migration, reducing maintenance overhead by 50% and enhancing cross-product consistency.
Refactored internal libraries using Kotlin Flow and reactive patterns, improving sensor data reliability and simplifying complex business logic for real-time biodata processing.
Built a shared UI repository with a custom atomic design system across Cardio & Strength teams, enabling 50% faster feature development and brand alignment across products.
Implemented GitHub Actions pipelines with device-based robotic testing, achieving 35% faster release cycles and improved code quality on embedded platforms.
Centralized Gradle convention plugins and multi-module setup, standardizing the approach across 8+ product lines and reducing onboarding time by 25%.
Mentored the team using CSM/CSPO expertise, optimizing sprint ceremonies and backlog refinement, resulting in 25% faster AI feature delivery.

experience.title: Team Lead - Android Engineer
experience.impact: Led Android development strategy for TIM’s mobile ecosystem (MyTIM, TIM Pay, TIMpersonal), powering digital experiences for over 20M+ active users.
keyAchievements: Progressed from Senior Engineer to Project Leader, managing Android teams and technical direction for consumer apps with 99.5% uptime SLA.
Transitioned legacy codebases to Kotlin and Clean Architecture, improving maintainability and reducing critical bugs by 30%.
Led development of TIM Pay (with Hype/Banca Sella), achieving 500K+ downloads, 4.6★ rating, full Kotlin implementation, and secure payment integration.
Architected MyTIM core redesign, driving major performance and reliability improvements for Italy’s most-used telecom app.
Mentored engineers and led sprint planning, code reviews, and interviews to build high-performing mobile squads.
Coordinated Google Play releases and alignment across product, design, and backend teams.

experience.title: Consultant and Mobile Engineer
experience.impact: Delivered full-cycle mobile solutions for Fortune 500 companies across utilities, automotive, and consumer sectors.
keyAchievements: Developed Android, Ionic, React Native, and Flutter solutions for high-profile clients.
Served as Tech Lead on RFPs, cost estimations, and architecture decisions, contributing to winning over €2M in projects.
Participated in DroidCon and CodeMotion as speaker/organizer, increasing the firm's technical visibility.
Architected E.ON B2C mobile app handling millions of IoT device interactions.
Contributed to Lamborghini Unica connected car companion app for premium automotive experiences.
Designed architecture for Estra Mobile App, an energy utilities customer engagement platform.

experience.title: University Internship
experience.impact: Worked on performance optimization via static and dynamic code analysis on embedded systems and mobile applications.
